response.raw:
Here is my response formatted as requested:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>

# Customer Service Representative Key Responsibilities

1. Provide product and service information
- Answer customer questions about products, services, pricing, etc.
- Explain features, benefits, and policies
- Offer recommendations based on customer needs

2. Process orders and transactions  
- Take new orders via phone or in person
- Enter order details into system
- Process payments and handle billing inquiries
- Assist with order modifications or cancellations

3. Manage customer accounts
- Set up new accounts and update existing account information
- Cancel accounts upon customer request
- Explain account terms, status, and billing

4. Handle customer complaints
- Listen to customer issues and obtain all relevant details
- Document complaints in the system
- Attempt to resolve problems or escalate to appropriate department
- Follow up with customers on complaint resolution

5. Maintain customer records
- Record notes from customer interactions
- Update customer contact information and preferences
- Track order history and account activity

6. Provide excellent customer service
- Communicate clearly and professionally 
- Show empathy and patience
- Go above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction

</OUTPUT_TEXT>
response.extracted:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
# Customer Service Representative Key Responsibilities

1. Provide product and service information
- Answer customer questions about products, services, pricing, etc.
- Explain features, benefits, and policies
- Offer recommendations based on customer needs

2. Process orders and transactions  
- Take new orders via phone or in person
- Enter order details into system
- Process payments and handle billing inquiries
- Assist with order modifications or cancellations

3. Manage customer accounts
- Set up new accounts and update existing account information
- Cancel accounts upon customer request
- Explain account terms, status, and billing

4. Handle customer complaints
- Listen to customer issues and obtain all relevant details
- Document complaints in the system
- Attempt to resolve problems or escalate to appropriate department
- Follow up with customers on complaint resolution

5. Maintain customer records
- Record notes from customer interactions
- Update customer contact information and preferences
- Track order history and account activity

6. Provide excellent customer service
- Communicate clearly and professionally 
- Show empathy and patience
- Go above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
